text:
Finally, an especial acknowledgement must be made of the
constant aid given to the Project Director and his colleagues
by Mr, A, A. Heckman, Executive Director of the Louis W. and
Maud Hill Family Foundation, Mr, Heckman!s wide experience with
surveys and reports concerned with many different aspects of
education makes his counsel and advice a most valuable resource
for any worker in any part of the educational field. It proved
to be such a resource many times over for my associates and for
me.
U John C. Schwarzwalder
Project Director
March 31, I960
St, Paul, Minnesota
